Class BoardsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.client.view.gui.viewControllers.BoardsController
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1BoardsController, Level2BoardsController
public abstract class BoardsController extends Object
The BoardsController is an abstract class that defines the base behavior, UI interactions, and functionality for managing ship boards and flying boards within the game. The class provides methods for binding game models, initializing button mappings, handling user interactions, and applying various visual effects to components in the game. It serves as a superclass for specific level-based boards controllers.

  • Method Details

    • initializeButtonMap

      protected abstract void initializeButtonMap()
      Initializes the mapping between coordinates and UI buttons. Each subclass defines its own coordinate-to-button mapping.

    • getFlyingBoardRelativePositions

      protected abstract Map<Integer,javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer>> getFlyingBoardRelativePositions()
      Gets the relative positions for the flying board based on the game level.
      Returns:
      a map of position indices to coordinate pairs

    • removeHighlightColor

      public void removeHighlightColor()
      Removes highlight effects from all ship board buttons. Thread-safe method that clears visual effects and styling from previously highlighted buttons.

    • updateMyNotActiveComponents

      protected void updateMyNotActiveComponents(Integer newVal, javafx.scene.control.Button button)

    • applyHighlightEffect

      public void applyHighlightEffect(Coordinates coordinates, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Applies a highlight effect to a specific button on the ship board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the button to highlight
      color - the color to use for the highlight effect

    • getNodeFromGridPane

      protected javafx.scene.layout.StackPane getNodeFromGridPane(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, int row, int column)

    • createPaws

      protected void createPaws()

    • handleShowFlyingBoardButton

      protected void handleShowFlyingBoardButton()
      Handles the UI event when user clicks the flying board button. Switches the view to show the flying board.

    • setupFlyingBoardBinding

      protected void setupFlyingBoardBinding()

    • setupShipBoardNavigationBarAndBoards

      protected void setupShipBoardNavigationBarAndBoards()

    • handleMyShipBoardButton

      public void handleMyShipBoardButton()
      Handles the UI event when user clicks the my ship board button. Switches the view to show the player's own ship board and updates UI elements accordingly.

    • handleGridButtonClick

      public void handleGridButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles clicks on ship board grid buttons. Parses the clicked button's coordinates and delegates to the event handler.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the JavaFX action event from the button click

    • updateShipBoards

      public void updateShipBoards(String nickname, int row, int column, Component newComponent)
      Updates the visual appearance of the ship boards when a component changes. If the updated component belongs to the current player, it updates the associated button on their ship board. Otherwise, it updates the corresponding cell in the other player's ship board grid.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player whose board is being updated
      row - the row index of the updated component
      column - the column index of the updated component
      newComponent - the new component to display at the specified location

    • setupGridBindings

      protected void setupGridBindings(javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Component>[][] observableMatrix)
